Description: I bought this guitar a few months back and it has far exceeded my expectations. It plays great, sounds great, and looks great. I am only selling because I need to raise some funds for another purchase. It is virtually a new instrument and you don't have to wait for one to become available like I did. Continental US bidders only.With the Viper-201B, you get a killer 27" scale baritone guitar that’s ready to rock, and that you can definitely afford. It’s classic offset double-cutaway design is made with set-neck construction for incredible tone and strength, and includes a pair of ESP Designed humbucker pickups along with a TOM bridge and tailpiece, a mahogany body, and a comfortable three-piece maple neck with roasted jatoba fingerboard and 24 extra-jumbo frets. Product Attributes · Model Year: 2018 · Color: Black · Body Style: Double Cut · Bridge Style: Fixed · Pickup Configuration: HH · Body Material: Mahogany · Neck Material: Maple · Fingerboard Material: Roasted Jatoba Product Features · 3-Piece Maple Neck · ESP-Designed LH-150 Pickups · Mahogany Body · Roasted Jatoba Fingerboard · Thin U Neck Contour Technical Description/Features · Scale Length: 27" Baritone · Fingerboard Radius: 350mm · Nut Width: 42mm
Title: ESP LTD Viper 201B Baritone Guitar (Excellent Cond.)
